--- In gladiator@y..., ComtriS@a... wrote:
> I agree to all the rules, except i have a question about one of 
them...
> In the case of a tie between scores, you said that you will settle 
it with 
> one of the following, and you list 7 things.  Is that the order that 
the ties 
> will be broken?  For example, there's a tie between two players, so 
they play 
> a tie-breaker scneario then if they tie there whomever doesn't have 
a cleric, 
> then if neither do, then whomever has a ghost, etc.

very good question.  The tie-breaker rules are listed in order.  I'm 
also emphasizing that there was strong opinion that the tie-breaker 
scenario (the first one rule) should resolve most (if not all) ties.  
Hopefully, by the time all 7 rules are gone through, all ties are 
broken.
